radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple stones within the gallbladder including a 13-mm stone at the gallbladder neck. Slight gallbladder wall edema. Gallbladder not particularly distended. No hyperemia in surrounding liver parenchyma. No filling defects within the CBD. No intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Slight fatty infiltration of the liver, but no focal lesions. Hepatic vasculature appears normal. Normal appearance of spleen, kidneys, adrenals, and pancreas. No free fluid or adenopathy present. Bone marrow signal appears normal.
